text: does HubSpot integrate with Google Hangouts/Google Meet?

I dont see anything in our marketplace for it <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/all-categories?eco_search=Google>

Would be awesome to toss on the ideas forum though then link back here in our <#C26E7JT8V|ideas> channel
This would be really helpful if there was an integration. I have some clients that are fed up with Zoom and want to migrate to Google Hangouts…

While not the easiest thing, you could use the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/events/web-analytics|web analytics API> to get all visits for all contacts and count the unique session Ids. Each session is a site visti
since HubSpot integrates with google calendar and google meeti is natively integrated with google calendar, it's kind of integrated
you won't have fancy metrics like meeting duration and that kind of stuff
can I DM you and you show me how???
but if you invite a contact to a meeting in HubSpot, you will have a a google meet link in the calendar event

I know you said you wanted info besides the  official docs, but <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/templates/drag-and-drop-areas> explains well the concepts and I highly encourage watching the video on this page
<https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/tags/dnd-areas>
It shows and explains the drag and drop areas well

Hey, all. We have a client with multiple HubSpot portals. Each with a unique brand and domain. They're interested in moving to Enterprise to host multiple domains and manage everything in one portal. Has anyone had experience with a move like this? I know I can copy templates from one portal to another. How about content and data? I found documentation for exporting (<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/account/export-your-content-and-data>). Is there ability to import all of this data too? Very green here, so looking for some guidance to point me in the right direction.

hello <@UB690RZA7> you try talk with support from HubSpot for ask if they gruop technical support can do everything you write?? if not, only you need copy all templates and copy all content export them and import in new plan and you need connect all domains.
